features.name: Global Smooth Scrolling
features.description: Implementation of Lenis smooth scrolling and synchronization with GSAP ScrollTrigger.

features.name: Navigation System
features.description: Responsive navigation header with language selection (KO/EN), sticky behavior on scroll, and mobile drawer with outside-click close functionality.

features.name: Particle Globe Visualization
features.description: High-density particle globe rendered on Canvas in the Hero section with continent definitions and intro animations.

features.name: Vision & Value Section
features.description: Conceptual introduction with premium glassmorphism effects and scroll-triggered fade animations.

features.name: Bento Grid Features
features.description: Display of key platform features using a responsive bento grid layout with hover effects.

features.name: How It Moves (Mobile Mockup)
features.description: Interactive section with tabs and an optimized mobile mockup displaying screen transitions.

features.name: Economy & Revenue Share
features.description: Visual representation of the platform's economic model using glassmorphism cards and custom SVG icons.

features.name: Multi-language Support
features.description: i18n implementation using a React Context provider for Korean and English translations.

features.name: Footer
features.description: Corporate information, contact details, social media links with accessibility labels, and scroll-to-top functionality.
